original_text: I am right. I have not done anything that is wrong. But my words would say that I am guilty. I am right. I have not done anything that is wrong.
korean_text: 가령 내가 의로울지라도 내 입이 나를 정죄하리니 가령 내가 온전할지라도 나를 정죄하시리라

sentences.original_text: I have not done anything that is wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 잘못된 일을 한 적이 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: But my words would say that I am guilty.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내 말은 내가 죄가 있다고 말할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: I have not done anything that is wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 잘못된 일을 한 적이 없습니다.
